DataElement.preferredDefinition: The code used to document patient immunizations.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The source from which something comes or issues; to take, obtain, or receive from a source._A technique used to cause an immune response that results in resistance to a specific disease, especially an infectious disease._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
